amendment.description: To include a representative from the Southwestern State of Nevada on the Southern Border Security Commission.

action.text: Amendment SA 1227 proposed by Senator Heller.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1227, under the order of 6/19/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 157.
